To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Hammer _hammer;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_hammer = Hammer(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_hammer.IsReady)
{
    var period = _hammer.Period.Value;
    var current = _hammer.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.hammer = self.Hammer(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.hammer.IsReady:
    period = self.hammer.Period.Value
    current = self.hammer.Current.Value
